column5: im redoing my boat, putting new wood floor and carpet in. Does anyone know of a good place to get carpet around lindsay? thanks
Consider that no slip marine vinyl---no more vacuum
where can i pick up some of that?

That I wish I had an answer for---all's I know is I would like it in mine.  Carpeting is ok if your waterski-ing---fishing---gets bloody---sandy--worm guts---fish scent eats some--hides small hooks--  Vinyl--get a hose  I'm sure someone will let you know where to buy
Lowes home depot or Rona all have marine carpet as a rule if they don't have it in stock they can order it. I believe I spent 100or so yrs back re doin a boat
I'd be looking at vinyl if I did it again.

I agree. Get marine vinyl no slip. Try talking to an upholster who works with boats. I put in carpet 5 years ago. Stands up great but you end up doing a lot of shampooing after a couple of fishing trips.
You can order it through Cabela's or Bass pro.

Home Hardware sells a nice vinyl for doing outdoor decks that would be perfect in the boat. I love my vinyl floor and my snap out carpet. I leave the carpet in most of the summer.. but when the nasty weather starts it comes out.

Special Touch Marine Upholstery & Canvass  209 Brigade Drive,  Hamilton, ON L9B 2G4   905-385-3409 ask for Gunner   I bought my Marine Vinyl from him. Great guy to deal with... I picked out my colour and had it in my hands in two days... he can als install for you if you like.   G

I MUCH prefer CARPETING but that's a personal choice...however, if you want to check out carpeting, etc...here's Cabela's inventory on this stuff.  http://www.cabelas.com/cabelas/en/common/search/search-results1.jsp?_dyncharset=ISO-8859-1&hasJS=false&_D%3AhasJS=+&http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cabelas.com%2Fcabelas%2Fcommerce%2FCabelasCatalogNumberFinder.giftCertificateURL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cabelas.com%2Fcabelas%2Fen%2Ftemplates%2Fgiftcertificate%2Fgiftcertificate.jsp%3Fid%3D0005586990011a%26podId%3D0005586%26catalogCode%3DIB%26navAction%3Djump%26indexId%3D&_D%3A%2Fcabelas%2Fcommerce%2FCabelasCatalogNumberFinder.giftCertificateURL=+&sort=all&QueryText=boat+carpeting&Go.x=0&Go.y=0&_DARGS=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cabelas.com%2Fcabelas%2Fen%2Fcommon%2Fsearch%2Fsearch-box.jsp.form23&_requestid=85241
I put "dura dek" in my boat and love it:thumbsup_anim: Got it at Millwork in Oshawa
